Container.Name: mariadb
Container.Overview:
This template was created using comp2unraid
Convert docker compose templates to unraid templates
https://github.com/Ogglord/comp2unraid
Container.Author: Ogglord

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: Specify the value for env: PUID

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Specify the value for env: PGID

Config.Name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Specify the value for env: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD

Config.Name: TZ
Config.Description: Specify the value for env: TZ

Config.Name: Volume for /config
Config.Description: E.g. /mnt/appdata/mariadb for config and /mnt/data/ for other volumes
